Hostdare is a privately owned company that has been providing reliable and affordable shared hosting, reseller hosting and dedicated servers since 2015.

SPECIAL: We are now offering first month at only one cent !!

Coupon Code is : 1cent


Features Included Are :

- WHM/Cpanel Control Panel
- Softaculous Auto Script Installer for Cpanel
- Instant Setup
- Free Pro-Active Monitoring
- Apache Webserver
- 99.9% Uptime guarantee
- 24/7 Support via ticket system or live chat
- Free Account Migration From Another Host
- CURL, ImageMagick, GD, PHP 5, MySQL 5, IonCube, Zend Optimizer and more!
-Free domain name on annual terms
